name: MoySklad Naffas - Check Price by Article

parameters.query: ={{ `SELECT n.article, n.name, n.category_raw as category, cp.price, cp.in_stock, cp.updated_at FROM nomenclature n JOIN current_prices cp ON cp.nomenclature_id = n.id JOIN outlets o ON o.id = cp.outlet_id WHERE n.article = '${$json.article.replace(/'/g, "''")}' AND o.code = 'moysklad-naffas' LIMIT 1;` }}
